alert.note: Alert for Lower Rio Grande Valley; Upper Tularosa Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 01 at 12:41PM MDT until June 02 at 3:00AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 AM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...East winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. The strongest winds will occur below canyons. * WHERE...Lower Rio Grande Valley and Upper Tularosa Valley. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 3 AM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways. Areas of blowing dust will reduce visibility and deteriorate air quality.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Lower Rio Grande Valley; Upper Tularosa Valley
